title: Katmai National Park & Preserve: Current Job Openings
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us     Current Job Openings              Current Job Openings       Check this page frequently for current job openings at Katmai National Park and Preserve. Please note, local hire positions are not advertised on USAjobs and will not be displayed on this page. Visit Katmai’s local hire page for information on those job opportunities. Permanent and other full-time employment opportunities can be advertised year-round. Seasonal summer work is typically advertised November-February. The application period for jobs can span a few days to a month or more depending on the position.       Current Job Opportunities Applications for jobs with the National Park Service are accepted via USAJOBS, the federal government's official source for federal job listings and employment opportunity information. The jobs listed below are drawn from USAJOBS, and clicking on any of them will take you to the detailed job announcement on USAJOBS. This list includes only jobs open to U.S. citizens. To see jobs open to eligible federal employees as well or to search for other employment opportunities, visit USAJOBS.
